message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $175?
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, the product is worth a lot to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $185.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $175 again?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $180.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to consider a price of $170?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer it to you for $178.
I'm really close to my budget now, but I'm still not comfortable with $178. Would you be willing to consider a price of $165?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I can offer it to you for $172.
I'm really not comfortable with $172. I think I've reached my limit. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I'll consider buying the product from John for $150 instead.
